These are the current list of data collections available in the Copernicus Data Space Ecosystem backend through openEO.

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: false
import openeo
connection = openeo.connect("openeo.dataspace.copernicus.eu")

```
```{python}
#| echo: false
connection.list_collections()
```
